import React from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';// Custom tooltip component
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomTooltip=_ref=>{let{payload,label,active}=_ref;if(active&&payload&&payload.length){const{avg_temp,min_temp,max_temp,dominant_condition}=payload[0].payload;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{backgroundColor:'#fff',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:`Date: ${label}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:`Average Temperature: ${avg_temp}°C`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:`Min Temperature: ${min_temp}°C`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:`Max Temperature: ${max_temp}°C`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:`Dominant Condition: ${dominant_condition}`})]});}return null;};const GraphLine=_ref2=>{let{data}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:400,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:data,margin:{top:20,right:30,left:20,bottom:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomTooltip,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"avg_temp",stroke:"#8884d8",activeDot:{r:8},name:"Average Temperature",strokeWidth:4}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"min_temp",stroke:"#82ca9d",name:"Min Temperature"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"max_temp",stroke:"#ffc658",name:"Max Temperature"})]})});};export default GraphLine;
